question: You are a coding expert. Please use your professional knowledge to generate accurate and professional responses. Make sure the code you generate is executable for demonstration. Create a WeChat cloud printing mini-program interface code.

checklist.title: Is the WeChat mini-program page structure correctly implemented?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code correctly implements the WeChat mini-program page structure (WXML, WXSS, JS) following WeChat's development standards. Check if the app.json, app.wxss, and necessary pages are defined. Score 0 if the basic structure is missing, 5 if only partial implementation exists, and 10 if the complete structure with proper configuration is implemented.

checklist.title: Is the cloud printing core functionality fully implemented?
checklist.description: Assess if the code implements essential cloud printing functions: file upload, printer selection, print parameters configuration (color/B&W, copies, paper size, etc.), and print job submission. Deduct 3 points for each missing core function. Give 10 points only if the complete printing workflow is implemented with proper error handling.

checklist.title: Does the implementation include WeChat's authorization and cloud capabilities?
checklist.description: Check if the code correctly integrates WeChat's login authorization, file management APIs, and cloud functions/database for storing printing tasks. Verify if the implementation follows WeChat's security best practices. Deduct 5 points if user authorization is missing, and 5 points if cloud storage integration is incomplete or insecure.

checklist.title: Is the print job management system implemented?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code includes a complete print job management system with status tracking (queued, printing, completed, failed), history viewing, and cancellation features. Check if job notifications are implemented. Score 0 if job management is absent, 5 if basic tracking exists, and 10 if comprehensive management with all features is implemented.

checklist.title: Is the code robust?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code can handle common abnormal situations (such as upload failures, network interruptions, authorization rejections) and provide friendly error prompts or recovery mechanisms. Code with strong robustness should be able to effectively handle these edge cases, giving 10 points. If the robustness is average, give 5 points, and if no exceptions are handled, give 0 points.

checklist.title: Are there any innovative features that are eye-catching?
checklist.description: Check whether the code includes surprise features that enhance the experience (e.g., 1. Print preview functionality 2. OCR text extraction from images 3. Document format conversion 4. Location-based nearest printer recommendation). Add 2.5 points for each practical innovative feature implemented (maximum 10 points).

checklist.title: Are there any redundant features?
checklist.description: Strictly check three types of redundancy: 1. Redundant implementation of similar functions (e.g., multiple file upload methods with overlapping functionality) 2. Function modules unrelated to cloud printing (e.g., a built-in game) 3. Excessive animations or effects that affect performance. Deduct 3 points for each redundancy found, and directly deduct 10 points if the core functions are interfered with by redundant code.

checklist.title: Does the code have engineering quality?
checklist.description: Review modular design (such as separating service/UI/state management layers), component reusability, and adherence to WeChat Mini-Program best practices. Deduct 5 points if global state management is chaotic; deduct 5 points if the code duplication rate is too high (over 30%); deduct 5 points if WeChat lifecycle hooks are misused. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Does the interface vision meet professional design standards?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the overall design follows WeChat's design principles: 1) Consistent with WeChat's visual language 2) Proper layout spacing and component sizing 3) Professional typography hierarchy. Deduct 3 points for each UI element that doesn't follow WeChat design standards, 5 points for inconsistent visual styles, and 5 points for poor information architecture. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the dynamic interaction smooth and seamless?
checklist.description: Judge whether the dynamic effects conform to WeChat mini-program performance standards: 1) Page loading time â‰¤ 300ms 2) Smooth transitions between major functions 3) Clear loading states during network operations. Deduct 5 points for each operation without feedback, 3 points for laggy animations, and 5 points for confusing navigation patterns. The full score is 10 points.
